mapper.insert:
insert into client (id, name, addr, abbr, nickname, source, asso_com, asso_invoice, invoice_name, invoice_tax_num, invoice_addr, invoice_tel, invoice_bank, invoice_acc, invoice_is_spec, client_class, indust_class, client_level, client_num, status, opp_numb, not_comp_quot, last_finish_date, last_trace_user, reserve_days, trace_user_id, en_name ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{abbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assoCom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assoInvoice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invoiceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invoiceTaxNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invoiceAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invoiceTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invoiceBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invoiceAcc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invoiceIsSpec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clientClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{industClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clientLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clientNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oppNumb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{notCompQuot,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastFinishDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastTraceUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserveDays,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{traceUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{enName,jdbcType=BIGINT} )
select LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.update: update client set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, addr = #{addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, abbr = #{abbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, source = #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, asso_com = #{assoCom,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, asso_invoice = #{assoInvoice,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, invoice_name = #{invoiceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invoice_tax_num = #{invoiceTaxNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invoice_addr = #{invoiceAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invoice_tel = #{invoiceTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invoice_bank = #{invoiceBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invoice_acc = #{invoiceAcc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invoice_is_spec = #{invoiceIsSpec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, client_class = #{clientClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, indust_class = #{industClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, client_level = #{clientLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, client_num = #{clientNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, opp_numb = #{oppNumb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, not_comp_quot = #{notCompQuot,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_finish_date = #{lastFinishDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_trace_user = #{lastTraceUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reserve_days = #{reserveDays,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, trace_user_id = #{traceUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, en_name = #{enName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
